Installing VIOS updates

  1. Latest VIOS updates can be found at 
    pgnmsv01:/prod/images/vio/vios2

    Inspect the level the current server is at as padmin 

    ioslevel

    Now update the rest. The fixpacks must be installed prior to interim fixes.

  2. Switch to root and NFS mount the updates directory
    mkdir -p /mnt/viosupdate
mount pgnmsv01:/prod/images/vio/vios2/fixpacks /mnt/viosupdate
  3. Install the updates as padmin user
    updateios -commit
updateios -accept -dev /mnt/viosupdate/{insert latest VIOS level here}
